dr.evomodel.operators
Class TreeUniform

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.operators.AbstractTreeOperator
          dr.evomodel.operators.TreeUniform
All Implemented Interfaces:
MCMCOperator
public class TreeUniform
extends AbstractTreeOperator

Uniform height change of several related tree nodes at once. Currently supported - a parent-son pair and parent-two sons triplet.

Author:
Joseph Heled
